article.title: iRobot Receives $3.7 Million Order from Naval Sea Systems Command
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: iRobot Corporation has received a $3.7 million order from the Naval Sea Systems Command (NAVSEA) under an existing indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract for delivery of 17 PackBot Man Transportable Robotic System (MTRS) robots and repair parts.
